Mangle::Stream::OutFileStream

std::ofstream file

Detailed Description

File stream based on std::ofstream, only supports writing.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Mangle::Stream::OutFileStream::OutFileStream ( const std::string &  name,
bool  append = false 
) [inline]

By default we overwrite the file. If append=true, then we will open an existing file and seek to the end instead.
